strings.schematron.title: DCAT-AP-Vlaanderen - Mandatory
strings.pattern.title.1: vcard:hasEmail is a URI with the mailto protocol.
strings.pattern.assert.1: vcard:hasEmail property is not a URI with the mailto: protocol.
strings.pattern.report.1: vcard:hasEmail property is a URI with the mailto: protocol.
strings.pattern.assert.2: The dcat:Catalog does not have a dct:license property with value 'https://data.vlaanderen.be/id/licentie/creative-commons-zero-verklaring/v1.0'.
strings.pattern.report.2: The dcat:Catalog has a dct:license property with value 'https://data.vlaanderen.be/id/licentie/creative-commons-zero-verklaring/v1.0'.
strings.pattern.assert.3: The dcat:Dataset does not have a dct:accessRights property with value 'http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/access-right/PUBLIC'.
strings.pattern.report.3: The dcat:Dataset has a dct:accessRights property with value 'http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/access-right/PUBLIC'.
strings.pattern.title.4: At least one keyword is required.
strings.pattern.assert.4: The dcat:Resource doesn't have any keyword.
strings.pattern.report.4: The dcat:Resource has at least one keyword.
strings.pattern.title.5: At least one of vcard:hasEmail or vcard:hasURL is required for a contact point.
strings.pattern.assert.5: A vcard:Organization does not have a vcard:hasEmail or a vcard:hasURL property.
strings.pattern.report.5: A vcard:Organization has a vcard:hasEmail or a vcard:hasURL property.
strings.pattern.title.6: Name - The name of the agent. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Agent%3Anaam)
strings.pattern.assert.6: The range of name must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (foaf:name)
strings.pattern.report.6: The range of name must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (foaf:name)
strings.pattern.title.7: v212. Name - The name of the agent. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Agent%3Anaam)
strings.pattern.assert.7: Only 1 value allowed for each language for name (foaf:name)
strings.pattern.report.7: Only 1 value allowed for each language for name (foaf:name)
strings.pattern.title.8: v000. Name - The name of the agent. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Agent%3Anaam)
strings.pattern.assert.8: At least 1 value expected for name (foaf:name)
strings.pattern.report.8: At least 1 value expected for name (foaf:name)
strings.pattern.title.9: 1001. Contact page - A web page that either allows contact (e.g., via a web form) or contains information on how to contact. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Contactinfo%3Acontactpagina)
strings.pattern.assert.9: The range of contact page must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI>. (foaf:page)
strings.pattern.report.9: The range of contact page must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI>. (foaf:page)
strings.pattern.title.10: 1002. Contact page - A web page that either allows contact (e.g., via a web form) or contains information on how to contact. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Contactinfo%3Acontactpagina)
strings.pattern.assert.10: Maximum 1 value allowed for contact page (foaf:page)
strings.pattern.report.10: Maximum 1 value allowed for contact page (foaf:page)
strings.pattern.title.11: 413. Email - The email address that a user can contact for information. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Contactinfo%3Ae-mail)
strings.pattern.assert.11: The range of email must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI>. (vcard:hasEmail)
strings.pattern.report.11: The range of email must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI>. (vcard:hasEmail)
strings.pattern.title.12: 1004. Email - The email address that a user can contact for information. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#Contactinfo%3Ae-mail)
strings.pattern.title.13: 1201. Creation date - The date of (formal) inclusion of the associated dataset or data service in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Aaanmaakdatum)
strings.pattern.assert.13: The range of creation date must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime>. (dct:issued)
strings.pattern.report.13: The range of creation date must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime>. (dct:issued)
strings.pattern.title.14: 1202. Creation date - The date of (formal) inclusion of the associated dataset or data service in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Aaanmaakdatum)
strings.pattern.assert.14: Maximum 1 value allowed for creation date (dct:issued)
strings.pattern.report.14: Maximum 1 value allowed for creation date (dct:issued)
strings.pattern.title.15: 1204. Alternative identifier - An alternative identifier (other than the unique identifier) for a record in the catalog can be described here. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Aalternatieve%20identificator)
strings.pattern.assert.15: The range of alternative identifier must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#Identifier>. (adms:identifier)
strings.pattern.report.15: The range of alternative identifier must be of the type <http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#Identifier>. (adms:identifier)
strings.pattern.title.16: 1206. Hoofdonderwerp - The resource (dataset or data service) described in the record. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Ahoofdonderwerp)
strings.pattern.assert.16: Maximum 1 value allowed for main subject (foaf:primaryTopic)
strings.pattern.report.16: Maximum 1 value allowed for main subject (foaf:primaryTopic)
strings.pattern.title.17: 1208. Hoofdonderwerp - The resource (dataset or data service) described in the record. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Ahoofdonderwerp)
strings.pattern.assert.17: The range of main subject must be of type <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Resource>. (foaf:primaryTopic)
strings.pattern.report.17: The range of main subject must be of type <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Resource>. (foaf:primaryTopic)
strings.pattern.title.18: 1209. Hoofdonderwerp - The resource (dataset or data service) described in the record. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Ahoofdonderwerp)
strings.pattern.assert.18: At least 1 value expected for main subject (foaf:primaryTopic)
strings.pattern.report.18: At least 1 value expected for main subject (foaf:primaryTopic)
strings.pattern.title.19: 1210. Identificator - The unique identifier of the record in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Aidentificator)
strings.pattern.assert.19: The range of identifier must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal>. (dct:identifier)
strings.pattern.report.19: The range of identifier must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal>. (dct:identifier)
strings.pattern.title.20: 1211. Identificator - The unique identifier of the record in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Aidentificator)
strings.pattern.assert.20: At least 1 value expected for identifier (dct:identifier)
strings.pattern.report.20: At least 1 value expected for identifier (dct:identifier)
strings.pattern.title.21: 1212. Identificator - The unique identifier of the record in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Aidentificator)
strings.pattern.title.22: 1215. Titel - The name of the record in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Atitel)
strings.pattern.title.23: 1216. Titel - The name of the record in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Atitel)
strings.pattern.assert.23: Only 1 value allowed for each language for title (dct:title)
strings.pattern.report.23: Only 1 value allowed for each language for title (dct:title)
strings.pattern.title.24: 1217. Titel - The name of the record in the catalog. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Atitel)
strings.pattern.assert.24: The range of title must be of type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (dct:title)
strings.pattern.report.24: The range of title must be of type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (dct:title)
strings.pattern.title.25: 1218. Wijzigingsdatum - The most recent date on which the record in the catalog was changed, updated, or adjusted. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Awijzigingsdatum)
strings.pattern.assert.25: Maximum 1 value allowed for modification date (dct:modified)
strings.pattern.report.25: Maximum 1 value allowed for modification date (dct:modified)
strings.pattern.title.26: 1219. Wijzigingsdatum - The most recent date on which the record in the catalog was changed, updated, or adjusted. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Awijzigingsdatum)
strings.pattern.assert.26: At least 1 value expected for modification date (dct:modified)
strings.pattern.report.26: At least 1 value expected for modification date (dct:modified)
strings.pattern.title.27: 1220. Wijzigingsdatum - The most recent date on which the record in the catalog was changed, updated, or adjusted. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#CatalogusRecord%3Awijzigingsdatum)

strings.pattern.report.27: The range of modification date must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime>. (dct:modified)
strings.pattern.title.28: 1301. Alternatieve identificator - An alternative identifier (other than the unique identifier) for a data service can be described here. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Aalternatieve%20identificator)
strings.pattern.assert.28: The range of alternative identifier must be of type <http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#Identifier>. (adms:identifier)
strings.pattern.report.28: The range of alternative identifier must be of type <http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#Identifier>. (adms:identifier)
strings.pattern.title.29: 1303. Beschrijving - A concise textual description of the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Abeschrijving)
strings.pattern.assert.29: The range of description must be of type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (dct:description)
strings.pattern.report.29: The range of description must be of type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (dct:description)
strings.pattern.title.30: 1305. Beschrijving - A concise textual description of the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Abeschrijving)
strings.pattern.title.31: 1306. Beschrijving - A concise textual description of the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Abeschrijving)
strings.pattern.assert.31: Only 1 value allowed for each language for description (dct:description)
strings.pattern.report.31: Only 1 value allowed for each language for description (dct:description)
strings.pattern.title.32: 1308. Biedt informatie aan over - The data offered via this data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Abiedt%20informatie%20aan%20over)
strings.pattern.assert.32: The range of servesdataset must be of type <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Dataset>. (dcat:servesdataset)
strings.pattern.report.32: The range of servesdataset must be of type <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Dataset>. (dcat:servesdataset)
strings.pattern.title.33: 1309. Conform aan protocol - A protocol to which the data service conforms. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Aconform%20aan%20protocol)
strings.pattern.assert.33: The range of conforms to protocol must be of type <http://purl.org/dc/terms/Standard>. (dct:conformsTo)
strings.pattern.report.33: The range of conforms to protocol must be of type <http://purl.org/dc/terms/Standard>. (dct:conformsTo)
strings.pattern.title.34: 1312. Contactinformatie - The relevant contact information with which an end user can contact the responsible parties of the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Acontactinformatie)
strings.pattern.assert.34: Maximum 1 value allowed for contact information (dcat:contactPoint)
strings.pattern.report.34: Maximum 1 value allowed for contact information (dcat:contactPoint)
strings.pattern.title.35: 1313. Contactinformatie - The relevant contact information with which an end user can contact the responsible parties of the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Acontactinformatie)
strings.pattern.assert.35: The range of contact information must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#Kind>. (dcat:contactPoint)
strings.pattern.report.35: The range of contact information must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#Kind>. (dcat:contactPoint)
strings.pattern.title.36: 1314. Contact information - The relevant contact information with which an end user can contact the responsible parties of the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Acontactinformatie)
strings.pattern.assert.36: At least 1 value expected for contact information (dcat:contactPoint)
strings.pattern.report.36: At least 1 value expected for contact information (dcat:contactPoint)
strings.pattern.title.37: 1315. Endpointurl - The root location or primary endpoint of the service (a web-resolvable URI). (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3AendpointURL)
strings.pattern.assert.37: The range of endpointURL must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI>. (dcat:endpointURL)
strings.pattern.report.37: The range of endpointURL must be of type <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI>. (dcat:endpointURL)

strings.pattern.title.39: 1318. Endpointurl - The root location or primary endpoint of the service (a web-resolvable URI). (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3AendpointURL)
strings.pattern.assert.39: At least 1 value expected for endpointURL (dcat:endpointURL)
strings.pattern.report.39: At least 1 value expected for endpointURL (dcat:endpointURL)

strings.pattern.title.46: 1327. Landingspagina - A general webpage that can be navigated to in a web browser, with general additional information about the data service. (https://data.vlaanderen.be/doc/applicatieprofiel/DCAT-AP-VL/ontwerpstandaard/2021-06-27#DataService%3Alandingspagina)

strings.pattern.title.117: Beschrijving - A concise textual description of the distribution.
strings.pattern.assert.117: The range of description must be of type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (dct:description)
strings.pattern.report.117: The range of description must be of type <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#langString>. (dct:description)
strings.pattern.title.118: Beschrijving - A concise textual description of the distribution.
strings.pattern.assert.118: Only 1 value allowed for each language for description (dct:description)
strings.pattern.report.118: Only 1 value allowed for each language for description (dct:description)
